item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, December 6, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Maliciously crafted GitHub branch name embeds crypto miner into a released package (24 points | 21 comments)
2. How to Pronounce Chinese Names a Little Better (41 points | 14 comments)
3. Fedora Moves Towards Forgejo (29 points | 2 comments)
4. Historically, 4NF explanations are needlessly confusing (7 points | 2 comments)
5. The "simple" 38 step journey to getting an RFC (38 points | 6 comments)
6. frood, an Alpine initramfs NAS (30 points | 8 comments)
7. A simple live calculator with tree-sitter + cranelift jit (26 points | no comments)
8. funding.json - an open manifest for describing financial requirements for FOSS projects (4 points | 1 comment)
9. What are you doing this weekend? (3 points | 6 comments)
10. Advent Of Code 2024 in Nix - Day 01-03 (23 points | 4 comments)
11. Kubernetes on Hetzner (6 points | no comments)
12. Flightle – Web-based 2D sidescrolling flight simulator (19 points | 2 comments)
13. [Proposal] introduce a new event in a Lua hook mechanism (3 points | no comments)
14. Launching the 2024 State of Rust Survey (5 points | no comments)
15. “Communicating Chorrectly with a Choreography” is out (10 points | 1 comment)
16. Alpine Linux 3.21 (27 points | 4 comments)
17. The Acton Programming Language (8 points | 4 comments)
18. std::map with pointers as keys (6 points | 3 comments)
19. Breakage! in the Cargo.toml — How Rust Package Features Work (And Break) (16 points | no comments)
20. Keyset Cursors, Not Offsets, for Postgres Pagination (58 points | 30 comments)
21. Reversing Anti-Cheat's Detection-Generation Cycle With Configurable Hallucinations (17 points | no comments)
22. How to pack ternary numbers in 8-bit bytes (14 points | 4 comments)
23. React 19 is now stable (1 points | no comments)
24. NASA Graphics Design Manual (1976) (18 points | 6 comments)
25. Praise to scdoc to generate man pages (30 points | 15 comments)
